fields.name: Chocolate
fields.description: All kinds of chocolate: milk, dark, and white. Chocolate with and without nuts. Chocolate with mint, caramel, and other types of sweet candy.

fields.name: Candy
fields.description: Sugar rush! So many colors and favors to pick from where do I start?

fields.name: Candy Bars
fields.description: Delicious chocolate in a shiny or colorful wrapper by names me know and love. Chocolate mixed with other sugary sweets like caramel, coconut, peanut butter, and other such goods.

fields.name: Hot Candy
fields.description: Candy that sets your tongue aflame!

fields.name: Truffle
fields.description: Chocolate with soft melty chocolate on the inside.

fields.name: Nuts and Chocolate
fields.description: Many different types of nuts in many different types of chocolate!

fields.name: Cookies
fields.description: Welcome to the dark side. Are you surprised we lied about the cookies?

fields.name: Cupcakes
fields.description: Little mini cakes with fluffy frosting, what's not to love?

fields.name: Muffins
fields.description: Like cupcakes, but with fruit, nuts, and sometimes chocolate. No one can give you dirty looks for eating a muffin for breakfast, even if it's a cupcake without frosting.

fields.name: KitKats
fields.description: Crunchy waffle milk chocolate candy bar!

fields.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
fields.description: Crispy on the outside, soft in the inside with melted chocolate throughout.

fields.name: Twix
fields.description: Caramel, waffle like crunch, with chocolate covered layering. YUM!
